name: Warlord
description: Oathkeepers who focus on martial excellence and leadership, commanding armies in the name of order and stability while balancing divine power with military strategy.

resource_systems.name: Mana
resource_systems.description: Divine energy that powers holy spells and abilities
mechanics: Mana points are spent to cast divine spells and channel holy power
Some abilities require maintaining a divine connection, consuming mana over time
Meditation increases mana regeneration rate by 300% but requires remaining stationary
Can channel mana into weapons and armor for tactical enchantments
Successful command abilities restore small amounts of mana

resource_systems.name: Divine Favor
resource_systems.description: Blessing from the divine that empowers righteous actions
resource_systems.regeneration: 2 per hour, additional points gained through upholding oaths and battlefield victories
mechanics: Divine Favor can be spent to enhance weapon attacks with holy power
Can be used to empower tactical abilities or protective auras
Acts as a resource for powerful oath abilities
Violations of paladin code can result in temporary loss of Divine Favor
Can be distributed among troops to enhance their combat effectiveness

resource_systems.name: Oath Power
resource_systems.description: Manifestation of a Warlord's unwavering commitment to their sacred vows
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when acting in accordance with oath tenets, decreases when violating them
mechanics: Increases by 15 when performing actions that exemplify oath tenets
Decreases by 20 when acting against oath tenets
At maximum Oath Power, enter an exalted state with enhanced abilities
Can be spent to invoke powerful oath-specific abilities
Warlords generate additional Oath Power when leading troops to victory

resource_systems.name: Command Points
resource_systems.description: Tactical acumen and battlefield authority that allows for coordinated military action
resource_systems.regeneration: 1 per minute in combat, 1 per 10 minutes out of combat
mechanics: Spent to issue tactical commands to allies
More complex commands require more Command Points
Successful execution of commands restores Command Points
Can be saved up for powerful battlefield-wide commands
Maximum Command Points increases with successful leadership

class_mechanics.name: Tactical Smite
class_mechanics.description: Channel divine power through weapon strikes with perfect tactical precision
effects: Divine Smite damage increased by 50% and applies tactical debuffs to enemies
Smites can mark targets as priority for allied attacks
Successful smites can create openings in enemy defenses for allies to exploit
Each successful smite grants tactical advantages to nearby allies
Can coordinate simultaneous smites with allies for devastating combined attacks

class_mechanics.name: Field Medicine
class_mechanics.description: Combine divine healing with battlefield medical knowledge
effects: Healing can be distributed efficiently among multiple wounded allies
Healed allies gain temporary combat bonuses
Can quickly stabilize critically wounded allies to keep them in the fight
Healing creates temporary damage reduction effects
Can establish field hospitals that provide passive healing to nearby allies

class_mechanics.name: Aura of Command
class_mechanics.description: Project an aura of authority and tactical superiority
effects: Allies within aura gain 20% increased damage and 15% damage reduction
Commands issued to allies within aura are 50% more effective
Enemies within aura suffer penalties to initiative and coordination
Aura prevents allies from being flanked or ambushed
Can maintain two different tactical auras simultaneously

class_mechanics.name: Battle Commander
class_mechanics.description: Assume the mantle of supreme battlefield authority
effects: Issue commands that coordinate allied actions for maximum effectiveness
Grant specific combat roles to allies with corresponding bonuses
Analyze enemy formations to identify weaknesses and optimal attack strategies
Rally broken troops and inspire heroic actions
Presence on the battlefield significantly increases allied morale and combat effectiveness

signature_abilities.name: Supreme Command
signature_abilities.description: Issue a perfect tactical command that coordinates all allies in a devastating maneuver
mechanics: All allies within 100 meters immediately execute a coordinated attack or maneuver
Each ally receives optimal tactical instructions tailored to their abilities
Coordinated action deals 200% normal damage and ignores 50% of enemy defenses
Creates perfect battlefield synergy for 30 seconds, with all allied actions complementing each other
Costs 50 Mana, 5 Divine Favor, and 10 Command Points

signature_abilities.name: Oath of Victory
signature_abilities.description: Declare an unbreakable oath to achieve victory, empowering yourself and all allies
mechanics: Declare a specific victory condition that must be achieved within 10 minutes
All allies gain 50% increased damage, 30% damage reduction, and immunity to fear
If the victory condition is met within the time limit, all allies are fully healed and restored
If the victory condition is not met, you suffer a significant penalty to all abilities for 1 hour
Costs 75 Mana, 7 Divine Favor, and 100 Oath Power

signature_abilities.name: Legendary General
signature_abilities.description: Transform into a legendary figure of military might, inspiring awe and terror on the battlefield
mechanics: Appearance becomes that of a mythic general from the past
All command abilities cost no resources and have double effectiveness
Each successful attack or command generates inspiration that enhances nearby allies
Can issue commands to any allied forces regardless of their normal chain of command
Enemies must make a Wisdom save or flee in terror from your presence
Costs 100 Mana, 10 Divine Favor, and 8 Command Points

skill_trees.name: Path of the Tactician
key_abilities: Perfect Strategy: Analyze a battlefield to identify the optimal approach with 100% accuracy
Tactical Genius: Issue commands that grant allies special combat maneuvers
Exploit Weakness: Identify and target critical vulnerabilities in enemy formations

skill_trees.name: Path of the Commander
key_abilities: Inspiring Presence: Rally broken troops and inspire heroic actions
Chain of Command: Establish a perfect command hierarchy that functions even in your absence
Lead by Example: Perform heroic deeds that inspire all who witness them

skill_trees.name: Path of the Conqueror
skill_trees.focus: Overwhelming force and victory at any cost
key_abilities: Unstoppable Advance: Lead a charge that cannot be stopped by any obstacle
Shock and Awe: Coordinate devastating attacks that break enemy morale
Victory Aura: Create an aura where allies cannot be defeated as long as you stand

advancement_requirements.skill_points: At least 15 points in the Greater Oath of Justice skill tree
advancement_requirements.alignment: Must maintain Neutral alignment for at least 10 levels
challenges: Lead a small force to victory against a much larger enemy
Establish a defensible position against continuous assault

legendary_items.name: Commander's Blade
effects: Tactical Smite damage increased by 40%
Commands issued while wielding this weapon have 30% increased effectiveness
Can mark targets for death, causing all allies to focus fire on them

legendary_items.name: Banner of Authority
effects: Aura of Command radius increased by 20 meters
Allies within your aura gain an additional 10% damage and damage reduction
Plants a magical standard that maintains your aura even when you move away

legendary_items.name: Helm of the Conqueror
effects: Intelligence increased by 5
Command Point maximum increased by 5
Legendary General cooldown reduced by 6 hours

lore: Warlords represent the perfect balance between divine power and military strategy among Oathkeepers, focusing their talents on leadership and battlefield dominance. Unlike their more zealous or corrupted counterparts, Warlords view their divine connection primarily as a tool to maintain order and stability in a chaotic world. They are pragmatic commanders who understand that sometimes difficult decisions must be made for the greater good, and that perfect justice must occasionally yield to practical necessity. Warlords often rise to prominence during times of conflict, their tactical brilliance and inspiring presence making them natural leaders of armies and military orders. They establish chains of command that function with machine-like efficiency, and their battlefield strategies are studied for generations. While they maintain their sacred oaths and divine connections, Warlords focus these powers toward practical military applications rather than purely ideological or spiritual ends. They are respected and sometimes feared for their unwavering resolve and willingness to do whatever is necessary to achieve victory, though they typically maintain a strict code of honor that prevents them from descending into true tyranny.
